question: "India Innovation Index", the nation's first online innovation index portal has been launched by _?
option1: Department of Scientific and Industrial Research (DSIR)
option3: NITI Aayog & Confederation of Indian Industry
answer: NITI Aayog & Confederation of Indian Industry
explanation: The National Institution for Transforming India (NITI) Aayog and Confederation of Indian Industry (CII) jointly launched India Innovation Index.
